CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Expiry_Date__c), "Active", IF( TODAY() > Expiry_Date__c, "Expired", IF( AND( Expiry_Date__c - TODAY() <= 30, Expiry_Date__c >= TODAY() ), "Expiring Soon", IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Issue_Date__c)), TODAY() < Issue_Date__c ), "Not Yet Active", "Active" ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Status
